item.description: sHALL WE MEET AT 1:00???? Saturday, August 27 · 10:00am - 6:00pm -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Location VFW Hall 152 Massirio Dr., Berlin, CT -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Created By Connecticut Pagan Pride -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- More Info This is a free event open to all. We are collecting for the local food bank and the CT Humane society in lieu of gathering admission. If you are able please bring with you a non-perishable food item, animal food, toys, clean blankets and towels. If you have questions or would like to volunteer, vend or sponsor at the event please email us at ctpp@broomstick.com. Also check out the vendors in the Link's section as many of them will be back this year:)
item.name: PAGAN PRIDE DAY!!!
